## Events.BlockFieldIntermediateChange.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `BlockFieldIntermediateChange` class

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(opt_block?: Block, opt_name?: string, opt_oldValue?: unknown, opt_newValue?: unknown);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  opt\_block | [Block](./blockly.block_class.md) | _(Optional)_ The changed block. Undefined for a blank event. |
|  opt\_name | string | _(Optional)_ Name of the field affected. |
|  opt\_oldValue | unknown | _(Optional)_ Previous value of element. |
|  opt\_newValue | unknown | _(Optional)_ New value of element. |
